vmhost_vib_test.comment: Ensure the Image Profile VIB acceptance level is configured properly

vmhost_acceptancelevel_test.comment: Ensure the Image Profile VIB acceptance level is configured properly

vmhost_ntpserver_test.comment: Ensure NTP time synchronization is configured properly

vmhost_advancedsetting_test.comment: Ensure the default value of individual salt per vm is configured
Ensure Managed Object Browser (MOB) is disabled
Ensure the DCUI timeout is set to 600 seconds or less
Ensure idle ESXi shell and SSH sessions time out after 300 seconds or less
Ensure the shell services timeout is set to 1 hour or less
Ensure the maximum failed login attempts is set to 5
Ensure account lockout is set to 15 minutes
Ensure DCUI has a trusted users list for lockdown mode
Ensure remote logging is configured for ESXi hosts

vmhost_service_test.comment: Ensure the ESXi shell is disabled

vmhost_vswitchpolicy_test.comment: Ensure the vSwitch Forged Transmits policy is set to reject
Ensure the vSwitch MAC Address Change policy is set to reject
Ensure the vSwitch Promiscuous Mode policy is set to reject

virtual_portgroup_test.comment: Ensure port groups are not configured to the value of the native VLAN
Ensure port groups are not configured to VLAN 4095 except for Virtual Guest Tagging (VGT)

vmhost_busadapter_test.comment: Ensure bidirectional CHAP authentication for iSCSI traffic is enabled

vm_advancedsetting_test.comment: Ensure only one remote console connection is permitted to a VM at any time
Ensure PCI and PCIe device passthrough is disabled
Ensure unauthorized connection of devices is disabled
Ensure VM Console Drag and Drop operations is disabled
Ensure VM Console Copy operations are disabled
Ensure VM Console Paste operations are disabled
Ensure virtual disk shrinking is disabled
Ensure virtual disk wiping is disabled
Ensure host information is not sent to guests
Ensure 'log.keepOld' is less than or equal to '10'
Ensure VM log file size is limited
Ensure VM log file size is limited and not = 0

vm_device_test.comment: Ensure unnecessary USB devices are disconnected
Ensure the 'serial_port' device's "Connected" property is set to is 'false'
Ensure the 'parallel_port' device's "Connected" property is set to is 'false'
Ensure unnecessary CD/DVD devices are disconnected
Ensure unnecessary floppy devices are disconnected

vmhost_ntpserver_object.comment: Ensure NTP time synchronization is configured properly
